strapiPost.title: Where Can You Get a Vaccine?
strapiPost.content:
Now that everyone in Arkansas is eligible for the vaccine, the next question is when and where can I get one? On Tuesday, the NWA Council announced plans to host weekly vaccination clinics in Benton and Washington Counties, through April 16.

  • The first Washington County clinic was held yesterday at at Donald W. Reynolds Razorback Stadium. The next mass vaccination will be in Fayetteville on April 7 at the Northwest Arkansas Mall.

  • The Benton County clinic this week is today from 8am to 4pm J.B. Hunt Corporate Headquarters in Lowell, Building C. Register HERE.

  • The Pfizer vaccine will be given at all NWA Council clinics. Second doses will be available at the same location three weeks after the first dose.
    Walk-ins will also be accepted, subject to availability.

For more information, visit nwacouncil.org/nwavaccines.
